Articles.Content:
Here's the thing, I've had a lovely stable version of KSP for ages, and haven't had any trouble. I haven't played in a while and the latest patch seems to have caused some issues, nothing major so far as I can see, but I can't see any engines in the VAB other than some Jets.

Here's the mod list from CKAN 

(Semi)Saturatable Reaction Wheels (SemiSaturatableRW 1.12.1)
Advanced Jet Engine (AdvancedJetEngine v2.11.3)
B9 Aerospace Procedural Wings - Fork (B9-PWings-Fork 1:v0.50)
Background Resources (BackgroundResources v0.13.9.0)
Click Through Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 0.1.6.2)
Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 0.10.0.0)
Connected Living Space (ConnectedLivingSpace 1.2.6.1)
Deadly Reentry Continued (DeadlyReentry v7.6.2)
Ferram Aerospace Research (FerramAerospaceResearch 3:0.15.9.1)
HangerExtender (HangerExtenderExtended 3.5.3.1)
Kerbal Engineer Redux (KerbalEngineerRedux 1.1.4.10)
Kerbal Joint Reinforcement (KerbalJointReinforcement v3.3.3)
Kopernicus Planetary System Modifier (Kopernicus 2:release-1.4.3-1)
KSC Switcher (KSCSwitcher 0.8)
KSP AVC (KSP-AVC 1.2.0.1)
MechJeb 2 (MechJeb2 2.7.3.0)
MechJeb and Engineer for all! (MechJebForAll 1.2.0.0)
ModularFlightIntegrator (ModularFlightIntegrator 1.2.5.0)
Module Manager (ModuleManager 3.0.6)
PersistentRotation (PersistentRotation 1.8.5)
Procedural Fairings (ProceduralFairings v4.0)
Procedural Parts (ProceduralParts v1.3.14-1)
RCS Build Aid Continued (RCSBuildAidCont 0.9.6.3)
Real Fuels (RealFuels rf-v12.5.0)
Real Plume (RealPlume 2:v11.0.0)
Real Solar System (RealSolarSystem v13.1.0)
Real Solar System Textures - 8192 x 4096 (RSSTextures8192 v13.1)
RealChute Parachute Systems (RealChute v1.4.6)
RealEngines (RealEngines v1.8)
RealHeat (RealHeat v4.5)
Realism Overhaul (RealismOverhaul v12.0.0)
Realism Overhaul Craft Files (RealismOverhaulCraftFiles v12.0.0)
RemoteTech (RemoteTech v1.8.10.3)
RSS DateTime Formatter (RSSDateTimeFormatter 1.2.0.0)
SmokeScreen - Extended FX Plugin (SmokeScreen 2.8.0.0)
Solver Engines plugin (SolverEngines v3.6.1)
TAC Life Support (TACLS) (TACLS v0.13.9.0)
TextureReplacerReplaced (TextureReplacerReplaced V0.5.4)
Toolbar (Toolbar 1.7.17.11)
Toolbar Controller (ToolbarController 1:0.1.6.5)
Ven's Stock Part Revamp (VenStockRevamp v1.9.6)

Can anyone see where the engines have gone?
